Name: Thunderbolts - Techno
Game Text: Acts as a level 4 Intellect attack. May combine with 1 Fighting card for a single attack.

Name: Scorpion
Game Text: +1 to attack if opponent has 4, 5, or 6 Mission cards in Completed Pile.

Name: Thunderbolts - Atlas
Game Text: Target Character may not attack for remainder of battle until Target or teammate attacks this Special. Attack does not count toward Venture Total.
